text.0: i will sing near for grace your god agni for he is good to us.
text.1: son of the brands may he give gifts and righteous save us from the foe.
text.2: for he is true whom men of old enkindled and the gods themselves.
text.3: the priest with the delicious tongue rich with the light of glorious beams.
text.4: with wisdom that surpasseth all with gracious will most excellent.
text.5: o agni worthy of our choice shine wealth on us through hymns of praise.
text.6: agni is king for he extends to mortals and to gods alike.
text.7: agni is bearer of our gifts worship ye agni with your thoughts.
text.8: agni gives to the worshipper a son the best of mightiest fame.
text.9: of deep devotion neer subdued bringer of glory to his sire.
text.10: agni bestows the herolord who conquers with the men in fight.
text.11: agni bestows the fleetfoot steed the victor never overcome.
text.12: the mightiest song is agnis shine on high thou who art rich in light.
text.13: like the chief consort of a king riches and strength proceed from thee.
text.14: resplendent are thy rays of light loud is thy voice like pressingstones.
text.15: yea of itself thy thunder goes forth like the roaring of the heaven.
text.16: thus seeking riches have we paid homage to agni conqueror.
text.17: may he most wise as with a ship carry us over all our foes.
